verbs.description: Richard Painter , a former White House ethics attorney under President George W. Bush who [V: is] running for the U.S. Senate in Minnesota as a Democrat , is taking his pointed criticism of President Trump straight to voters .

Richard Painter , a former White House ethics attorney under [ARG0: President George W. Bush] [R-ARG0: who] is [V: running] [ARG1: for the U.S. Senate] [ARGM-LOC: in Minnesota] [ARGM-MNR: as a Democrat] , is taking his pointed criticism of President Trump straight to voters .
